metadata.Title: CVE-2018-12930 on Ubuntu 23.04 (lunar) - low
metadata.Description: ntfs_end_buffer_async_read in the ntfs.ko filesystem driver in the Linuxkernel 4.15.0 allows attackers to trigger a stack-based out-of-bounds writeand cause a denial of service (kernel oops or panic) or possibly haveunspecified other impact via a crafted ntfs filesystem.

criterions.comment: linux package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-09-06').
linux-aws package in lunar is affected, but a decision has been made to defer addressing it (note: '2019-09-06').
